title: I need more coffee! Addon
description:
Do you like coffee? Then this addon is for you. This addon adds two new drinks that will make you run and mine faster. It will be very helpful on your survival worlds.

    This addon adds 2 types of coffee. Each of them gives movement and mining speed. Coffee mugs give more speed and last longer.

    First of all, you have to gather and plant coffee cherries. You can obtain them by breaking grass.

title: New Smartphone addon
description: New Smartphone addon for MCPE is real working phone with cool application in Minecraft. This addon adding new features in Minecraft PE real working apps and games

title: Portal Gun
description: Want to experience the portal gun of java but in bedrock? with this add-on you can now experience the portal gun and you can troll the animals and even your friends by teleporting them everywhere.

title: RPG Damage Indicator
description: Transform your Minecraft Bedrock experience with the RPG Damage Indicator Addon! All mobs and enemies now display a health bar in true RPG style. This addon is fully compatible with custom mobs and other addons, ensuring seamless integration with your creations.

title: Dynamic Paintings
description: You can display them in a Frame for all players to see, and they will see the name of the painting and who made it!

title: Plants vs. Zombies
description: GPVZA is an Add-On that added a lot of plants and zombies entities from the Plants vs. Zombies series to Minecraft.

title: 4 Creepypasta Legends
description: This add-on adds 4  Mobs!.And Each of them has ability. These are Herobrine Entity 303 Enti ty 404 and Of course Null!. They Very Power Mob so be sure to Grab An Best Items To Beat Them!

title: Pathways
description: Every type of wood has its own bridge in this Addon. The wood bridges are made out of an end piece and a middle piece.

title: Lifesteal
description: Killing a player gives you their heart, getting killed by any source will lose you a heart (This can be changed using ?heart envsteal)

title: Chisel For Bedrock
description: Ever desire more blocks to build with in your world? This unofficial port of the popular Java edition mod Chisel adds over 2000 block variations of vanilla blocks, as well as some new ones, that can be crafted at the stonecutter. In addition to the stonecutter you can also craft an iron chisel and interact with the chisel blocks to cycle through all the variations of that block.

title: Dynamic Lighting
description: You can use different items that gives off light to light your surroundings by just holding it in your hands. The dynamic light has a fix light level of 8.

title: Simple Backrooms
description: This addon works by infinitely generating the backrooms below your world.

title: Vanilla Upgrade
description: Vanilla Upgrade is a large passion project Team Various and I have been working on sense 2021, this addon aims to add an assortment of stuff with a variety of usefulness. We add stuff going by the logic of ""something Minecraft would add, but remember that the mace was added""

title: Elemental Swords
description: Elemental Sword is an addon that adds magical swords with powers. In this version, you can find the fire sword and the blue fire sword; their hidden power generates a circle of fire that burns nearby enemies. To activate each sword’s power, right-click on PC, or press the power activation button on Android or iPhone.

title: Mobs Plus
description: This addon adds 9 spider variants, 4 skeleton variants, 4 chicken variants, 2 horse variants and pig variations. It is compatible with other addons.some of the variants are guardian, blaze and witch which will be generated in the world.

title: Back To Basics
description: This addon aims to add more manual items to use to craft stuff instead of everything being inserted. It is also geared towards sky block, With its own option, otherwise creating a string from dirt is a bit overpowered when you have an abundance of dirt. Pairs well as a before machinery era.

title: Dharkcraft Clothes
description: Add new crafted clothing that can be used in your worlds, simulating Java clothing mods! This add-on includes over 400 fully placeable clothing pieces.

title: Weapons+ 3D
description: Introducing Weapons 3D for Minecraft Bedrock Edition! This addon brings a diverse range of powerful hammers to enhance your combat experience. Whether you’re fighting off mobs or mining blocks, these hammers are perfect for the job, each with unique stats and abilities.

title: Mythical World Boss II
description: This is separate from my add-on called Devilbrinecraft Beta. Devilbrine ""The Overlord"" of Mythical World can summon his army, and his queen Evil Lilith ""The Queen of Deception"" can summon too. this add-on have a too sword called ""Omega Lord Sword"" and ""Alpha Lord Sword"" one of powerful weapon is ""Devilbrine Lightning Power"" if you want see how powerful the boss of Mythical World, this is for you.

title: MelodyCraft
description: MelodyCraft is a feature-packed Minecraft Bedrock Edition addon designed for music enthusiasts and creative builders alike! This addon introduces exciting new musical elements to enhance your gameplay experience, allowing you to bring the joy of music into your Minecraft world.

title: Mine BMX - Bikes for Minecraft!
description: Use the new BMX-style bikes that allow the player to move faster and more dynamically without relying on any mounts.

title: More Tools Addon
description: Expand Your Game with 800 More Tools & Items, and 20 New Blocks! Whether you’re crafting, building, or exploring, this add-on enriches your world with new possibilities, all while keeping that classic vibe intact. The goal of this addon is just to give you that vanilla style vibe nothing more nothing less.

title: ALEX'S CAVE
description: My Alex's Cave Addon for Minecraft Bedrock this Addon will add a new cave and new dinosaur and new blocks Items for your game, For now there is only one type of cave, but I intend to add more caves. The Addon is inspired by the Java mod Alex's Cave.

title: Parasite Apocalypse
description: Have you ever wanted to have more difficulty in Minecraft? Well this addon is for you, it adds new parasite creatures that will evolve over time and make the game more difficult. This addon is inspired by the scape and run parasites mod created by Dhanantry

title: True Survival - Zombie Apocalypse
description: Step into True Survival - Zombie Apocalypse but stay alert! The dead have risen and are hungry for brains. Zombies will be roaming every corner of your world. Survival is possible but only if your good enough. I wish you the very best. Good Luck!

title: Naruto Guerra Wg
description: Immerse yourself in the world of Naruto with this Add-On, bringing the ninja experience to Minecraft like never before. Unlock unique jutsus, explore clan abilities, and face challenging foes inspired by the iconic series. Train, strategize, and become a true shinobi as you master elements, summon powers, and engage in epic battles. With custom mechanics and detailed features, this Add-On transforms the game into a thrilling adventure filled with action, strategy, and creativity. Are you ready to awaken your ninja path?

title: Modern Ferniture | +750 Block
description: The addon is about a collection of modern furniture to decorate your home, the addon has the purpose of not being so modern (not going beyond the parameters such as complex electronic devices or mechanics that break the game) or wanting to saturate your house with polygons, which be at the end of everything simple and beautiful.

title: The bizarre world
description: The bizarre world(Tbw) is a additional pack for stand disc, Tbw brings more stands to the game such as Golden experience requiem, The world over heaven, Wonder of you, Soft and wet/Go beyond and etc.

title: Home Electronic
description: Home Electronics is an Add-On that adds furniture and functional appliances, including consoles, chairs, televisions, toasters, outlets, and much more!

title: Alylica's Dungeons Addon
description: Alylica's Dungeons aims to blend the content of Minecraft Dungeons with the style and flow of vanilla Minecraft, boasting a large collection of weapons, enemies and powerful bosses - if you are a fan of Minecraft Dungeons and playing in survival, this may be the addon for you!

title: Slash Blade Addon
description: Are you tired of ordinary swords? Have you seen 3d Katana? Try this add-on! This add-on adds Slash Blade! Let's face the monsters with this! Your Minecraft life should change ...!

title: Old Villagers Plus
description: This add-on brings back the old villagers and their old villages without replacing the existing ones, it includes new features. It also adds the old zombie villagers, entities that no longer appear naturally since the villager update.

title: Craftmon Legacy [A Pokemon addon]
description: Welcome to the Minecraft World of Pokemon, Jump into Craftmon Legacy and start your epic adventure catching, battling and evolving to become the very best Pokémon trainer you can be. When you start your adventure you will have a Letter from Professor Oak! Open the Letter to choose your Starter Pokémon. You will have the choice of either Bulbasaur, Charmander or Squirtle.

title: Emoji Whimsy
description: Introducing Emoji Whimsy! This addon will allow you to use emojis in your chat dialog! Simply type the emoji and then send! The final message will have your emoji! Enjoy!

title: Redstone Gear
description: Introducing to y'all the new Redstone Armor Set this new armor is between the Diamond Armor Set and the Netherite Armor Set. It also comes with the ability of the health boost

title: Ghost Add-on
description: Welcome to the Ghost Add-on. In this Minecraft Bedrock add-on, when you die, you will respawn as a ghost. How do you get started? Let's begin. Firstly, you must travel to a Pillager Outpost or a Woodland Mansion and obtain the Totem of the Afterlife. Just like with a vanilla totem, you must die with the totem in hand and you will respawn as a ghost. In your death spot, you will leave behind a tombstone that'll carry all your items. To respawn as a normal player, you will need to die while holding the Totem of Resurrection, which can be obtained from killing the Ender Dragon.

title: Wan's X-Ray Goggles
description: Craft your X-Ray Goggles to be able to see whatever you want! Toggle the various upgrades to see all the ores, chests, mob spawners and entities (also other players) around you through the walls!

title: RPG ELEMENTAL WEAPON
description: This addon introduces 6 unique elemental RPG weapons(will be update) into your Minecraft world! Each weapon comes with its own distinct powers and effects, making combat more thrilling and challenging. Enhance your adventures by defeating powerful enemies with the forces of nature at your command!

title: Suspicious Gift
description: Hi I am ZorroCraft from India, This addon drops random gifts from mob kills. Open them for OP loot or dangerous mobs! Use tap, eat, or right-click to unwrap. It’s a gamble—loot or fight, good luck!

title: Cataclysmical
description: Cataclysmical is a large content add-on that adds various blocks, weapons, mobs and even bosses. Cataclysmical aims to add a fun and hard challenge to Minecraft. Some mobs and bosses are intended to be hard and might even feel unfair at sometimes. Enjoy and have fun!

title: Cute Mob Models
description: Are you sick of Minecraft mobs of looking too ugly?Ever wanted Minecraft mobs to look like cute anime girls?Well, they aren't exactly from an anime but they do sure resemble like one.Now's your lucky day! Cute Mob Models is a mob redesigning project that turns them into girls that you might find pretty.

title: Sunflower Delight Bedrock
description: Sunflower Delight is an addon for the popular food mod Farmer's Delight (Bedrock Port). The mod adds sunflower seed products and a little more!

title: Lucky Clover
description: Lucky Clover - this mod adds a clover to the game, which will give you luck in fishing, or rather causes it

title: Crabber's Delight Bedrock
description: The mod adds many new dishes related to crab fishing, including crabs, shrimp, clams and a new creature called clawsters. All these creatures can be caught on a Crab Trap and cook a lot of different foods from them.

title: Five Nights in Minecraft
description: Welcome to freddy's fazbear pizza, where fantasy and fun comes to life! This add-on adds some FNaF things in form of minecraft blocks! like walls, floors, crates and arcades! yay!

title: Dragon Mounts 3
description: This addon (MOD) is the official work of Dragon Mounts 3 in the Bedrock Edition. In this Addon you can ride a dragon and fly in the sky, or you can tame your dragon to make it your good assistant. If you want to play to the original Dragon Mounts Mod please come over!

title: Raiyon's Java Combat
description: Java combat is based on the cooldown, which is a certain time with a weapon/tool in which you can do the maximum damage with it and can be visually seen as a loading bar below the cursor.

title: More Ores Addon
description: This addon adds 28 new ores, 29 armors, mining helmets, hammers, tree decapitator, talismans and tool variations. It is compatible with other addons. Supported languages: English, Spanish and Portuguese.

title: What Am I Looking At?
description: See what you are looking at directly from your HUD! This utility Add-On adds a display on top of your screen, packed with intuitive and useful information about the world around you.

title: Backpack Plus Addon
description: Do you want a backpack addon that works very similar to the Backpack mods from java? or do you want to carry alot of things but don't have anymore space in your inventory? This addon is just for you!

title: MS-100 Car Addon
description: It is the new Addon MS-100 Car is a new compact sports car, this sports car has FWD traction and has a maximum speed of 215 km / h and accelerates from 0 to 100 km / h in 7 seconds, This is ideal for racing, or going very fast as it offers a lot of power, This compact car has a capacity for 4 passengers.

title: Morphing Bracelet
description: Morphing Bracelet gives players the ability to morph into different mobs. Simply kill a mob while keeping a bracelet in your inventory to collect it and morph into it. To craft this item, you need four soul soil blocks and one soul glass block.

title: Medieval Furniture Addon
description: Revamp your Minecraft surroundings with a touch of medieval charm. This Addon introduces an array of default-textured blocks, including tables, cozy chairs, and a diverse range of furniture pieces to elevate your gaming experience.

title: The Silk Road
description: The Silk Road is a Minecraft addon that brings the medieval silk road to your game! Explore civilizations, including China, the Byzantine Empire, India, and the Abbasid Caliphate, all while fending off the Mongol invasions! Trade, build an army, and raise up your own Kingdom!

title: Transformers: Rise of the Beasts
description: Unleash your inner Autobot or Decepticon as you traverse through mesmerizing landscapes inspired by the Transformers: Rise of the Beasts film. Engage in epic battles against fellow players or hostile mobs, showcasing your strategic prowess and combat skills.

title: ONE PIECE
description: hello everyone, in this Minecraft ONE PIECE. i packed all pirates and villain into 1 add-on. this add-on is light and can be played on any phone.   you can only use the WEBSITE version to install this add-on.

title: BLOOD ELF
description: To make it easier for you to create custom Creepypasta survival video content. If you prefer focusing on one mob at a time, you don’t need to edit any code—just install the standalone version. To provide a challenge for survivors who want to face them in a 1 vs. 1 duel.

title: SSADAKO
description: To make it easier for you to create custom Creepypasta survival video content. If you prefer focusing on one mob at a time, you don’t need to edit any code—just install the standalone version.To provide a challenge for survivors who want to face them in a 1 vs. 1 duel.

title: Soviet-Afgan War Addon V0.2(3D Gun Addon)
description: This addon will add guns, equipment and vehicle to your Minecraft (so far only Soviet soldiers) from the Soviet-Afghan war of 1979-1989. and to be more precise, 10 types of guns, 8 types of equipment, 1 vehicle and 2 medicines.

title: Zombie Apocalypse v2
description: APOCALYPSE (add-on) brings the map's experience to your own worlds! Fend off hordes of zombies, buy weapons, utility, abilities or boosters at the Shop, or even build a fortress with your friends! Play survival and live on the edge with Hordes possibly spawning at any moment! Plus you can CHAINSAW zombies for ammo! This add-on features custom UI, 3D Weapons, custom zombies, blocks & more!

title: DeadZone
description: DeadZone is a survival addon inspired by the game DayZ that puts you in the role of a survivor in a post-apocalyptic world. The goal is simple: survive as long as possible, search every building for loot, and craft your own story along the way.

title: Project Walker Addon
description: Explore a run-down, overgrown world taken over by zombies. To survive, you must scavenge for food and weapons, and fight off the zombies, exploe  abandoned structures and much more, all of which, produced by Gabriel Aplok for everyone!

title: XRay
description: It allows you to use xray inside of Minecraft with just one click and can help you search for rare ores or hidden chests.

title: Dynamic Health Bar
description: This addon shows a health bar above entities. Bar location  top of entities hitbox use it for a clearer and more immersive experience

title: Lancia Delta - Simple Rally Car Addon
description: The Lancia Delta Integrale addon brings the legendary rally car to Minecraft with unmatched style and performance. Known for its go-kart-like driving position, this car offers a thrilling and dynamic experience. Its sleek design and realistic details make it a perfect addition for both car enthusiasts and adventurers alike.

title: Shahnameh addon - persian legends
description: Every country has a unique and fascinating story that showcases its culture, traditions, and values, and this is the story of my country, Iran! The Shahnameh, an ancient epic from Iranian history, is filled with heroic tales and legendary events, all narrated in an abstract and symbolic way. In this Add-on, you step into the role of Rostam, the legendary Persian hero. Explore the land, embark on thrilling adventures, and prepare for epic battles as you take up your sword to face powerful enemies. This Add-on introduces tools, animals, and characters inspired by the Shahnameh, making your Minecraft experience both exciting and culturally rich!

title: Creepypasta From The Fog
description: In the Minecraft creepypasta from the fog, legend spoke of a mysterious figure with glowing white eyes—a phantom known as Herobrine. Players whispered tales of him appearing without warning, staring, and vanishing into the fog. Most dismissed the stories as a joke, but Notch, the game's creator, knew the truth

title: Creepypasta Expansion
description: This addon is designed to make your survival game scarier and more haunting. But don’t worry—you have the power to fight back and even become the hunter!

title: In Silence Addon
description: This is a small Addon that adds Rake and Rat from the game In Silence to the world. Will fill your world with danger and a horror element, be a victim or a hunter, you decide.

title: Zombie Apocalypse
description: Hello everyone, i am game hunter or game hunter9. in this Minecraft from the fog. I will gather all the legendary creepypastas into one addon pack. If you are a fan of creepypasta from the fog, please scroll down.

title: Infested Parasites V1
description: this addon changes how survival works in the game by adding new mobs, items and structures, inspired in Scape And Run Parasites this addon adds parasites  that infect other mobs. This addon may contain scary content for a certain audience

title: Parasite Biome
description: This addon adds a new biome to minecraft. However its a very hostile place and takes a true hero to adapt And survive….good luck and watch out for the infected mobs!

title: Medieval Cart Addon
description: This addon adds two types of medieval carts which have characteristics that make them very useful and pleasing to the eye

title: Natural Structures Redone
description: Natural Structures Redone is and addon that adds new foliage option that does not interrupt the flow of normal Minecraft generation! Updates are done by biomes/climates.

title: AnimeCraft
description: Would you like to have your own favourite anime character on Minecraft? Yes?, then with AnimeCraft your dream will became true, this mod includes 37 characters  from animes such as Nanatsu no Tazai The seven deadly sins and Kimetsu no Yaiba Demon Slayer, it also includes 3 originals characters based on the mod developers. Hope you enjoy having your favourite characters in your minecraft world.

title: DarkAge Bizarre Remake
description: Get ready for more challenging nights, formidable bosses, structures filled with valuable loot, superpowered items, and mobs that will assist you on your adventure.

title: Mario.EXE
description: Deep within the corrupted code of the world, an anomaly lurks Mario.EXE. Legends speak of a glitched entity, a shadow of something familiar yet twisted beyond recognition.

title: Vietnam Dragon
description: Vietnam Dragon – The Legendary Guardian The Vietnam Dragon is a powerful mythical entity, embodying the forces of fire, lightning, and earth. As an ancient guardian, it wields devastating abilities, unleashing fiery storms, earthquakes, and lightning strikes upon its foes. With a massive health pool and formidable skills, only the bravest warriors dare to challenge it. Defeating the Vietnam Dragon grants legendary rewards, making it a true test of strength and strategy.

title: Parasite Paradise v2
description: Parasite Paradise es uno de los mejores complementos infectados para Minecraft Bedrock, que transforma tu experiencia de juego agregando nuevos parásitos que pueden infectar criaturas y jugadores, además debes intentar derrotar a los nuevos jefes, ¿estás listo?

title: Fungus Hazard
description:
This Mod is inspired by the infectious agent from the video game story The Last of Us,
adapted to the Minecraft video game by means of a system of infection and growth in phases,
It should be noted that there is zero chance of adding modern weapons, I will focus on the spread of the virus.

title: Biological Infestation
description: Biological Infestation is an addon in development that transforms your world into a nightmare terrain, filled with infected creatures and dangerous infested structures. With evolving mobs, threat-generating blocks, and a hostile environment that will test your survival skills, this addon is designed to offer you an intense and challenging gaming experience. Immerse yourself in a world where every step can be your last!

title: El Gigante Boss
description: Some know him as a bioweapon parasite, and some know him as a server-destroying horror boss. Either way, it's your childhood in a walking monster. Are you ready to overcome your fears?

title: Dwellers Horror [From the fog]
description: This addon is ready to make your game of survival blast to the max! This addon adds several terrifying dwellers monsters that are hunting you down! Learn how each monster works below. Prepare to face the horrifying creatures out to hunt you!

title: Pale Garden Fog
description: Do you wish the Pale Garden biome had more dense fog to add to the spooky atmosphere? Dense fog can even be seen in the promotional art for the Pale Garden, however the fog is normal in game. Well this pack fixes that by adding thicker fog to the Pale Garden biome and has 12 different subpacks to choose from, allowing for complete customizability of how you want the fog to look!

title: Siren Head Addon V4 (REVAMPED)
description: If you the one who liked scary thing and challenging to play in your survival world, then this add-on is for you it added the scariest mobs and extremely creepy mobs into your game

title: Super Dog Addon
description: Transform your wolf into a powerful combat machine with this addon!When fed an enchanted golden apple, your wolf will enter "Chaos Mode," teleporting to enemies and dealing massive damage

title: Thirsty and Temperature bar addon
description: If you are feeling a bit bored with Minecraft ? and looking for more challenge ?, then this addon will be the ideal destination. With its addition, the game will not only feature two basic bars of hunger and health, but also four new components of temperature , thirst ,speed and first aid bar. This is what makes the game more difficult, requiring you to face new challenges and adjust your tactics. This addon expands a new dimension to Minecraft, giving players a more unique and realistic experience

title: Edds Jetpacks (Jetpack Addon)
description: This addon adds a variety of jetpacks to the game, along with a unique way to fuel them.

title: Mythical Runes
description: Mythical Runes introduces 3 new engraved rune crystals in different colors: Redstone Rune, Glowstone Rune, and Lazuli Rune. Combine them to craft unique rune combinations and cast one of 10 different spells.

title: Air Plane
description: Explore the skies with the Air Plane addon for Minecraft Bedrock! Add planes to the game, allowing for fast and exciting flights. Ideal for exploring maps or traveling long distances, this addon transforms your survival and adventure experience.

title: Yo-kai Craft Add-on
description: Welcome to the Yo-kai Craft add-on. This add-on adds tons of different features to your Minecraft world that originate from the series Yo-kai Watch, those features include the yo-kai themselves, custom yo-kai, bosses, items, food, and more to explore! In the Chronic Update, several new Yo-kai have been added aswell as a boss being revamped. I will go into more detail below.

title: Voxel Builder
description:
To start, place one of the available voxel layers in the creative inventory.
Placing it on top of a block will bring up a grass block platform where you can start building with blocks of your choice from the creative inventory, including blocks from other addons

title: End Magic
description: To acquire magic in SURVIVAL, when you first load the world you will be given an option to choose a magic(for now Its just end). Once you've chosen, it will occupy your first 5 slots in your hot bar.(same goes for everyone in the world)

title: Smuttie's Mob Girls Add-On
description: Smutties Mob Girls is an add-on that transforms many hostile and neutral mobs into human girls with custom models while preserving most animal mobs. Female models were designed to offer a less intimidating and more delightful gameplay experience. These models were also re-animated to reflect the character of each mob.

title: Legendary Piglins: Horde of the Spore
description: Legendary Piglins is an addon inspired by Minecraft Legends that expands the Piglin universe by introducing new entities with unique abilities and engaging dynamics. Currently a work in progress, this project promises innovative challenges and enhanced gameplay. Stay tuned for future updates and see how these legendary Piglins will transform your adventures

title: Foods Plus 2
description: Agriculture and food in general is an important aspect of Minecraft that can be expanded on. This addon helps improve and expand it by adding in over 40+ brand new crops, 100+ new foods, new mobs, and so much more! Food's plus 2 is a complete overhaul of the original food's plus addon, Additionally, This addon is also translated into multiple languages, and it has compatibility with most other addons.

title: Edds' VeinCapitator
description: Have you wanted to be able to chop down trees in one break? Or maybe, you want to mine coal, but it would take too long? Say no more! with Edds VeinCapitator you can do both!

title: Astraliyte's Potions
description: Hello and welcome to another bedrock port that I made! Astraliyte Potions was originally made by Astraliyte for Java Edition and was ported by me to Bedrock Edition. This pack adds styles to different potions so you can distinguish their differences.

title: Health and Damage Indicator Addon
description: No more guessing if your attacks are effective or how tough your foes really are. This addon gives you the power to monitor combat like a pro, bringing a more immersive and strategic element to your battles.

title: Max's Better Mobs
description: This pack is a compilation of my bedrock ports of creepermax123s Java Edition packs that aims to give Minecraft more life by adding mob variations. All of the packs that are included in this pack have their standalone versions. Check them out below the description!

title: All-Purpose Drone
description: To start using a drone you must first place a packed drone block and interact with it, after that a small drone will appear. When you interact with the drone, a menu will open with several options where you can configure the tasks you want the drone to execute, order it to follow you, change the movement mode, open the camera, open the settings or dismantle it.

title: 1.2 [Sprunki] Incredibox
description: Welcome to the wild world of the Official Minecraft Sprunki Addon, where quirky creatures and intense abilities take center stage! Inspired by the fan-made Incredibox Sprunki Mod, this edition brings a whole new layer of excitement to your Minecraft adventures. Each Sprunki you encounter has unique abilities, making them unpredictable and thrilling to interact with!

title: Sprunki Incredibox Horror Version
description: All characters have their own music except Black - Phase 1. Killing Black - Phase 1 or Spawning Black Phase 2 would make every character around to transform into Phase 2 (the horror version). While Black - Phase 2 is still around they would keep transforming into Phase 2. Only Mr. Sun - Phase 1 can take damage from water.

title: SPRUNKI V1
description: Incredibox Sprunki Nextbots V1 Addon

title: SPRUNKI V2
description: Incredibox Sprunki Nextbots V2 Addon
